version_description:
There’s a new building in the dragon sanctuary - the Temple of Evolution!
It will make your dragons stronger and let them continue to grow beyond their limits!
Also, it’s now easier than ever to train your dragons: we improved the interface for th

Create elemental armor in the Forge to make your dragons stronger in battle and help you win the most valuable tournament prizes!

What’s new:
- Dragon armor
- A new building, the Forge
- Materials for making armor, which you can get i

***AMULETS***
Make your armor even stronger by inserting Element Amulets! They offer unique advantages in battle — a chance to deal double damage, restore your dragon's health and lots more!

New features:
- The gifting system has been mo

What’s new:
- 2 new islands
- A second Breeding Cave and Nursery on the new Archipelago
- A global map that combines all your islands, tournaments, and leagues

Fixes:
- Fixed the bug that made the app crash when inviting friends
- I

A grand new update is here – the Book of Dragons!
The Book of Dragons is a reference work about all the 280+ different types of dragons in the game! Players can use it to track the achievements of all of their pets as well as any bonuses that can be u

Finally an update!
From now on all dragons will be able to wear armor! A special mode of rendering the armor has also been added. This shall significantly improve the performance of the game. Now you will be able to see your beloved pets in all their g

Gift time in Dragons World!
The daily reward chain has been increased from 5 days to a month. Visit the game every day to get useful prizes: coins, crystals, armor, dragon eggs and much more!
In addition, there are some awesome in-game events on the

Fixes:
- Increased game's speed and overall performance
- Fixed numerous bugs that led to crashes when device memory was insufficient

ELVISH ARCHIPELAGO
You’re going to have way more space now! Expand your domain and make it look even better with the new flying islands of the Elvish Archipelago. Cloudless Island, Life Tree Island and Thousand Winds Island are waiting to be settled an

***TECHNICAL IMPROVEMENTS***

Bug fixes:
- Moving between archipelagos is faster
- Less device memory use in high level worlds
- Other overall technical optimisation
- Correction of several errors that cause game crashes

***INTERFACE UPDATE***

Check out the new and improved interface in Dragons World. Everything you need is just a few taps away! There’s also a really big update coming in autumn!

- Go to the dragon feeding window on your islands from the Bo

***DRAGONOLOGIST GUILDS***

Dragonologists unite! You now have the opportunity to create your own guild and play together with your friends! Talk to each other in a group chat and bring your guild to the pinnacle of glory!

***LIBRARY***

Soon you'll be able to access the Library! In it you can buy valuable books and use them to upgrade your pets' skills. It's a great way to make your dragons healthier, better and stronger!
What's new:
New building – Library
